languages.text: "Ты похож{mf||а} на одного моего знакомого, {name}. Тот имел лавку с товарами, но вечно завидовал своему соседу, потому что его лавка приносила больше. Тогда мой знакомый убил соседа и отобрал его лавку, только товары соседские ему не понравились — и он заменил их на свои. В итоге лавка соседа так и не стала приносит ему больше прибыли".

traits.locale_text: "Ты похож{mf||а} на одного моего знакомого, {name}. Тот имел лавку с товарами, но вечно завидовал своему соседу, потому что его лавка приносила больше. Тогда мой знакомый убил соседа и отобрал его лавку, только товары соседские ему не понравились — и он заменил их на свои. В итоге лавка соседа так и не стала приносит ему больше прибыли".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "You remind me of a man I once knew, {name}. He had a well-stocked shop but was envious of his neighbour because his store was more profitable. So he killed his neighbour and took over the shop, except he didn't like the goods and quickly replaced them with his own. Then he wondered why his neighbour's business failed to make him any more money."
languages.original_text: "Ты похож{mf||а} на одного моего знакомого, {name}. Тот имел лавку с товарами, но вечно завидовал своему соседу, потому что его лавка приносила больше. Тогда мой знакомый убил соседа и отобрал его лавку, только товары соседские ему не понравились — и он заменил их на свои. В итоге лавка соседа так и не стала приносит ему больше прибыли".

traits.locale_text: "You remind me of a man I once knew, {name}. He had a well-stocked shop but was envious of his neighbour because his store was more profitable. So he killed his neighbour and took over the shop, except he didn't like the goods and quickly replaced them with his own. Then he wondered why his neighbour's business failed to make extra money."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

Then he wondered why his neighbour's business failed to make him any more money."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “你让我想起某个我认识的人，{name}。他经营着一家商店，经营得很好，但他却嫉妒他的邻居，因为他的邻居赚得更多。于是他杀了邻居，接管了邻居的商店，但他却不怎么喜欢邻居的货物，于是就用他自己的货物换掉了邻居的货物。在那之后，他一直想不通，为什么邻居的店铺没有为他赚来更多的钱。”
languages.original_text: "You remind me of a man I once knew, {name}. He had a well-stocked shop but was envious of his neighbour because his store was more profitable. So he killed his neighbour and took over the shop, except he didn't like the goods and quickly replaced them with his own. Then he wondered why his neighbour's business failed to make him any more money."

traits.locale_text: “你让我想起某个我认识的人，{name}。他经营着一家商店，经营得很好，但他却嫉妒他的邻居，因为他的邻居赚得更多。于是他杀了邻居，接管了邻居的商店，但他却不怎么喜欢邻居的货物，于是就用他自己的货物换掉了邻居的货物。在那之后，他一直想不通，为什么邻居的店铺没有为他赚来更多的钱。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "You remind me of a man I once knew, . He had a well-stocked shop but was envious of his neighbour because his store was more profitable. So he killed his neighbour and took over the shop, except he didn't like the goods and quickly replaced them with his own. Then he wondered why his neighbour's business failed to make him any more money."

languages.text: «Me recuerda a un hombre que conocía, {name}. Tenía una buena tienda, pero envidiaba a su vecino porque la suya era más rentable, de modo que lo mató y se hizo con su tienda. Después, como no le gustaban sus productos, los cambió por los suyos. Nunca llegó a entender por qué no ganaba más dinero con la tienda de su vecino».
languages.original_text: "You remind me of a man I once knew, {name}. He had a well-stocked shop but was envious of his neighbour because his store was more profitable. So he killed his neighbour and took over the shop, except he didn't like the goods and quickly replaced them with his own. Then he wondered why his neighbour's business failed to make him any more money."

traits.locale_text: «Me recuerda a un hombre que conocía, {name}. Tenía una buena tienda, pero envidiaba a su vecino porque la suya era más rentable, de modo que lo mató y se hizo con su tienda. Después, como no le gustaban sus productos, los cambió por los suyos. Nunca llegó a entender por qué no ganaba más dinero con la tienda de su vecino».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「あんたって、あたしがかつて知っていた男を思い出させるわね、{name}様。その人は品揃えの良い店を持っていたんだけど、隣人の店の方が儲かっていたのを妬んでいたの。それで隣人を殺して、その店を引き継いだってわけ。でも、彼はその商品が気に入らなくて、すぐに自分の商品と取り替えたの。それでなぜ隣人の店なのに儲からないのか、不思議に思ってたのよ」
languages.original_text: "You remind me of a man I once knew, {name}. He had a well-stocked shop but was envious of his neighbour because his store was more profitable. So he killed his neighbour and took over the shop, except he didn't like the goods and quickly replaced them with his own. Then he wondered why his neighbour's business failed to make him any more money."

traits.locale_text: 「あんたって、あたしがかつて知っていた男を思い出させるわね、{name}様。その人は品揃えの良い店を持っていたんだけど、隣人の店の方が儲かっていたのを妬んでいたの。それで隣人を殺して、その店を引き継いだってわけ。でも、彼はその商品が気に入らなくて、すぐに自分の商品と取り替えたの。それでなぜ隣人の店なのに儲からないのか、不思議に思ってたのよ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr erinnert mich an einen Mann, den ich einst kannte, {name}. Er hatte einen gut ausgestatteten Laden, war aber eifersüchtig auf seinen Nachbarn, weil dessen Laden mehr Gewinn abwarf. Also tötete er seinen Nachbarn und übernahm dessen Laden. Nur gefiel ihm das Sortiment nicht also ersetzte er es durch sein eigenes. Dann fragte er sich, warum der Laden seines Nachbarn keinen Gewinn abwarf."
languages.original_text: "You remind me of a man I once knew, {name}. He had a well-stocked shop but was envious of his neighbour because his store was more profitable. So he killed his neighbour and took over the shop, except he didn't like the goods and quickly replaced them with his own. Then he wondered why his neighbour's business failed to make him any more money."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr erinnert mich an einen Mann, den ich einst kannte, {name}. Er hatte einen gut ausgestatteten Laden, war aber eifersüchtig auf seinen Nachbarn, weil dessen Laden mehr Gewinn abwarf. Also tötete er seinen Nachbarn und übernahm dessen Laden. Nur gefiel ihm das Sortiment nicht also ersetzte er es durch sein eigenes. Dann fragte er sich, warum der Laden seines Nachbarn keinen Gewinn abwarf."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Vous me rappelez un homme que j'ai connu, {name}. Il avait une boutique bien achalandée, mais il enviait son voisin dont le commerce était plus rentable. Il l'a donc tué et il a repris son établissement, sauf qu'il n'aimait pas la marchandise et l'a rapidement remplacée par la sienne. Puis il a été surpris de constater que ce nouveau magasin ne lui rapportait pas d'argent. »
languages.original_text: "You remind me of a man I once knew, {name}. He had a well-stocked shop but was envious of his neighbour because his store was more profitable. So he killed his neighbour and took over the shop, except he didn't like the goods and quickly replaced them with his own. Then he wondered why his neighbour's business failed to make him any more money."

traits.locale_text: « Vous me rappelez un homme que j'ai connu, {name}. Il avait une boutique bien achalandée, mais il enviait son voisin dont le commerce était plus rentable. Il l'a donc tué et il a repris son établissement, sauf qu'il n'aimait pas la marchandise et l'a rapidement remplacée par la sienne. Puis il a été surpris de constater que ce nouveau magasin ne lui rapportait pas d'argent. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Bana bir zamanlar tanıdığım bir adamı hatırlatıyorsun {name}. Ağzına kadar dolu bir dükkânı vardı ama daha çok kâr ediyor diye komşusunun dükkânını kıskanırdı. Gidip komşusunu öldürüp dükkânına çöktü ama içindeki malları beğenmeyip hemen kendininkilerle değiştirdi. Sonra da komşusunun dükkânı ona neden daha çok para kazandırmıyor diye kafayı yedi."
languages.original_text: "You remind me of a man I once knew, {name}. He had a well-stocked shop but was envious of his neighbour because his store was more profitable. So he killed his neighbour and took over the shop, except he didn't like the goods and quickly replaced them with his own. Then he wondered why his neighbour's business failed to make him any more money."

traits.locale_text: "Bana bir zamanlar tanıdığım bir adamı hatırlatıyorsun {name}. Ağzına kadar dolu bir dükkânı vardı ama daha çok kâr ediyor diye komşusunun dükkânını kıskanırdı. Gidip komşusunu öldürdü ve dükkânı ele geçirdi ama içindeki malları beğenmeyip hemen kendininkilerle değiştirdi. Sonra da komşusunun dükkânı ona neden daha çok para kazandırmıyor diye kafayı yedi."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
